House Democrats are committed to carrying the mantle #ForThePeople and continuing to fight for workers’ rights today and every day.

1433908817448820740.text:
The fate of American workers rests in the revitalization of the labor movement. 

Today, I celebrate their accomplishments with my brothers and sisters in the CWA and across the entire labor movement and wish all of you a safe and happy Labor Day.

1433908815641071626.text: The brave women and men of the labor movement made their demands and built their power and with it built the American middle-class. It is no coincidence that as union membership has declined over the last 40 years, so too have wages remained flat and the middle-class has shrunk.

1433908813913014272.text:
Institutions like OSHA, the National Labor Relations Board, and even Social Security are part of that legacy. 

Frederick Douglass said, “power concedes nothing without demand, it never has and never will.”

1433908812004610048.text: By organizing and making collective demands, by demonstrating their collective power through strikes, slowdowns and boycotts, they were able to wrestle from their bosses some of the benefits that we take for granted: better wages, 8 hour day, safer working conditions and so on.

1433908807617466372.text:
Happy #LaborDay weekend.

As you spend time with family and friends this weekend, keep in mind the sacrifices American workers have made. Men and women gave their literal blood, sweat, and tears to demand a better life for themselves, their families, and their fellow workers. https://t.co/8sbllKVmgp

1420516584163090435.text: Think about what you will say when a woman in your life who is not an elite athlete needs to take time to address her mental health. Then consider how what Simone did was both brave and should be normalized.

1420516582942457860.text: Women - and especially women of color - are often dismissed when it comes to their mental health needs. By merely standing up for her own health she has shed light on our own failures to respect the mental health needs of women…

1420516581893881856.text: To see people who have NEVER been in her shoes call her a quitter is infuriating…

1420516580753092608.text: And she recognized when her health was on the line and she took action. Her decision may have very well saved her from injury and saved her teammates a medal. She has epitomized the heights of her sport…

People struggling with drug addiction need doctors and counselors, not judges and jailers.

1405530869524156435.text:
We waste a fortune prosecuting and locking up people for simple possession.

@josh_goldberg To be eligible you must have a Social Security Number and have an income below $99k for single filers and $198k for couples filing jointly.
If you fit into this category this may be an error that people checking on their status have run into. Keep trying.

1252239256736669698.text:
I’ve heard some rumors and falsehoods around the $1200 stimulus checks.

The Truth:

- it’s not coming out of next years tax return

- you don’t have to pay it back (it’s not a loan)

- I know it’s not enough for many of you and I’m working to secure more.
